titles.title: No Free Rides Act
No Free Rides Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent individuals receiving work authorizations under certain deferred action programs from being eligible for the earned income tax credit.
No Free Rides Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
No Free Rides Act
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny the earned income tax credit to any taxpayer whose identifying Social Security number was issued pursuant to a work authorization obtained under any program not specifically established by law that provides aliens deferred action from removal.
